attributes.name: schemas
attributes.description: An array of Strings containing URIs that are used to indicate the namespaces of the SCIM schemas that define the attributes present in the current structure.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: A unique identifier for a SCIM resource as defined by the service provider.

attributes.name: userName
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the User, typically used by the user to directly authenticate to the service provider. Each User MUST include a non-empty userName value.  This identifier MUST be unique across the service provider's entire set of Users.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.

attributes.name: emails
attributes.description: Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Email addresses for the user.  The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider, e.g., 'bjensen@example.com' instead of 'bjensen@EXAMPLE.COM'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred mailing address or primary email address.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The components of the user's real name. Providers MAY return just the full name as a single string in the formatted sub-attribute, or they MAY return just the individual component attributes using the other sub-attributes, or they MAY return both.  If both variants are returned, they SHOULD be describing the same name, with the formatted name indicating how the component attributes should be combined.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as appropriate, formatted for display (e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: familyName
subAttributes.description: The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: givenName
subAttributes.description: The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages (e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: middleName
subAttributes.description: The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificPrefix
subAttributes.description: The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages (e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificSuffix
subAttributes.description: The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

attributes.name: profileUrl
attributes.description: A fully qualified URL pointing to a page representing the User's online profile.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The user's job title, such as 'Vice President.'

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description: Used to indicate the User's default location for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.

attributes.name: timezone
attributes.description: The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles'.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The User's cleartext password. This attribute is intended to be used as a means to specify an initial password when creating a new User or to reset an existing User's password.

attributes.name: phoneNumbers
attributes.description: Phone numbers for the User. The value SHOULD be canonicalized by the service provider according to the format specified in RFC 3966, e.g., 'tel:+1-201-555-0123'. Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', 'mobile', 'fax', 'pager', and 'other'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Phone number of the User.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work', 'home', 'mobile'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred phone number or primary phone number.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: photos
attributes.description: URLs of photos of the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: URL of a photo of the User.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, i.e., 'photo' or 'thumbnail'.

attributes.name: addresses
attributes.description: A physical mailing address for this User.  Canonical type values of 'work', 'home', and 'other'.  This attribute is a complex type with the following sub-attributes.

subAttributes.name: streetAddress
subAttributes.description: The full street address component, which may include house number, street name, P.O. box, and multi-line extended street address information. This attribute MAY contain newlines.

subAttributes.name: locality
subAttributes.description: The city or locality component.

subAttributes.name: region
subAttributes.description: The state or region component.

subAttributes.name: postalCode
subAttributes.description: The zip code or postal code component.

subAttributes.name: country
subAttributes.description: The country name component.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value for this attribute, e.g., the preferred messenger or primary messenger.  The primary attribute value 'true' MUST appear no more than once.

attributes.name: groups
attributes.description: A list of groups to which the user belongs.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the User's group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'Group' resource to which the user belongs.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

attributes.name: roles
attributes.description: A list of roles for the User that collectively represent who the User is, e.g., 'Manager', 'Operator'.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of a role.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: resourceType
subAttributes.description: The name of the resource type of the resource.

subAttributes.name: location
subAttributes.description: The URI of the resource being returned.

subAttributes.name: created
subAttributes.description: The 'DateTime' that the resource was added to the service provider.

subAttributes.name: lastModified
subAttributes.description: The 'DateTime' that the resource was updated last time.
